overview.heading: An Engaging Experience
overview.description: The previous site was neither intuitive nor engaging for the breadth of global users working in land tenure. Bixal worked with USAID stakeholders performing in-depth user studies and interactive engagements to help shape a simpler knowledge management tool and a more successful user experience.

overview.heading: Modern Design
overview.description: The Bixal team successfully launched a fully responsive and scannable site that integrates the latest in contemporary design and user experience-guided strategies.

overview.heading: Stakeholder Engagement
overview.description: An iterative understanding and confirmation of stakeholder usability from around the globe was critical to designing a solution in which the majority of people could access and understand information in a quick and substantive way.
